s1.message: The following lists the major changes compared to Adblock Plus 0.7.5.4:

s3.message: Format of the filter storage changed so going back to a previous version requires exporting the filters and re-importing them after the downgrade

s4.message: Mac OS X: Flash movies might not be displayed properly if "Show tabs on Flash and Java" option is switched on

s5.message: Some translations contain untranslated English strings

s7.message: New filter composer dialog makes adding filters easier

s12.message: restrict filters to third-party/first-party requests (forum topic)

s16.message: Tooltip now shows the filter source in addition to the filter itself (forum topic)

s17.message: Filters can now be disabled and re-enabled from the context menu (forum topic)

s18.message: Changed default action for blocked items to "Add exception rule" instead of "Edit filter"

s19.message: Made "State" the default sort order (blocked items first)

s20.message: Added support for multiple selection and copying of multiple addresses/filters (forum topic)

s21.message: Added "Select all" to the context menu

s22.message: Added "Copy filter" item to the context menu (forum topic)

s23.message: Added "Size" column (hidden by default), same information shown in the tooltip

s24.message: Changed filter color for element hiding hits (forum topic)

s25.message: Fixed: Header is hidden in full screen mode

s27.message: Eliminated delay when window is opened and much of the delay when changes are applied

s28.message: Mac OS X: Preferences menu changed into toolbar to make sure it stays inside the window (forum topic)

s29.message: Changed names for groups of user-defined filters (forum topic)

s30.message: Group/subscription titles use bold text now (forum topic)

s31.message: Added "View" menu to control visible columns and sorting, removed column picker

s32.message: Made new "View" menu the context menu for list header

s33.message: Groups containing user-defined filters can now be disabled (forum topic)

s34.message: Images for "Enabled" column made more obvious (forum topic, forum topic)

s35.message: Removed "Add filter" dummy from the list (forum topic)

s36.message: Added support for comments in all filter groups, not only "Advertisement filters"

s37.message: Comments now always stay before the same filter, regardless of sorting (also, they can be dragged even if the list is sorted)

s38.message: For invalid filters, tooltip now explains why they are invalid

s39.message: Removed user interface elements that were made obsolete by the filter composer: regular expression warning and corresponding preference

s41.message: , dropdown list in filter editor (forum topic)

s42.message: Filter export now inserts a checksum comment into the file (forum topic)

s43.message: Added a tooltip explaining the meaning of the exclamation mark

s44.message: Added a way to disable/enable filters and subscriptions from context menu

s45.message: "Reset filter statistics" now resets "Last hit" as well (bug 18650)

s46.message: Fixed: Findbar in preferences dialog has no icons (Firefox 3)

s47.message: Fixed: Dates would sometimes use wrong character encoding (bug 441370)

s48.message: Fixed: "Edit filter in effect" might select a filter in a disabled subscription even though it exists in enabled subscriptions as well (forum topic)

s49.message: Fixed: Clicking twice on the Enabled column starts filter editor

s50.message: Fixed: Changes to "download automatically" status are not displayed immediately

s51.message: Pasting filters with spaces (in particular comments) now possible (bug 18920)

s53.message: First start: Filter subscription selection is opened in a new tab rather than in a separate window (bug 15786)

s54.message: First start: Filter subscription selection will show up even if other extensions already added a filter subscription they maintain.

s55.message: "Add filter subscription" from Preferences brings up filter subscription selection rather than the dialog for custom filter subscriptions.

s56.message: Added warning if Filterset.G is installed with option to uninstall automatically

s57.message: Added Adblock warning with option to uninstall automatically (this was a separate question pop-up before)

s59.message: Regular expression warning was extended to also warn for filters that are too short to be optimized

s60.message: Warning that Adblock Plus is disabled allows re-enabling with a single click

s61.message: Removed ancient Drag&Drop handling code (not discoverable and not advertised anywhere)

s62.message: Fixed: "Disable on this page only" won’t work for pages with query string

s63.message: About Adblock Plus: Made version number selectable so that it can be copied

s64.message: About Adblock Plus: Made homepage link localizable (and different for German/French locales, bug 17136)

s65.message: Added "Adblock Plus: Blockable Items" to the View menu in Firefox (View – Toolbars menu in SeaMonkey)

s67.message: Core code was redesigned for better maintainability, code documentation and automated tests (based on Mochitest) were added for large parts of the core

s68.message: Made sure filter storage file isn't overwritten unless write was successful (bug 16488)

s69.message: Improved performance (esp. reading filter from disk and saving filters for large filter lists), reduced the amount of memory used

s70.message: Fixed: Exception rules don’t always apply to element hiding in Firefox 3 (bug 20034)

s71.message: Firefox 1.5, Thunderbird 1.5, SeaMonkey 1.0, Songbird 0.5/0.6 are no longer supported (removed some backwards compatibility hacks)

s72.message: Flock 1.2/2.0 and Songbird 0.7/1.0 are supported now

s74.message: Added hidden preference extensions.adblockplus.savestats to allow turning off hit statistics (useful if patterns.ini is put into a version control system) (bug 18650)

s75.message: Added support for private browsing mode in Firefox 3.1, hit statistics are disabled automatically

s76.message: All first run actions are now controlled by extensions.adblockplus.currentversion preference (replaces

s83.message: Changed patterns.ini format to allow user-defined comments (and potentially other filters as well) to be stored in any filter group

s84.message: Adblock Plus 0.6 preferences are no longer imported on upgrade

s85.message: Adblock preferences are no longer imported on upgrade (filter list still imported)

s86.message: Fixed: Object tabs show up on print (bug 19405)

s87.message: Fixed: "getBoxObjectFor() is deprecated" warning in error console (bug 19126)

s89.message: For subscription downloads, a comment "! Checksum: abcd" is now interpreted and files with wrong checksum are rejected to prevent broken downloads (forum topic, reference implementation to add checksums)

s90.message: Next attempt after failed download is after one day now rather than after one hour to prevent server overload (adjusted preference extensions.adblockplus.subscriptions_fallbackerrors accordingly)

s91.message: Fallback request can now disable automatic downloads for subscriptions that are no longer available

s92.message: Fixed: Subscription downloads sometimes go to browser cache
